OnePassword is a password manager that works on both Mac and  Windows computers.

Install 1Password for your OS from the AgileBits website [AgileBits](https://agilebits.com/downloads) website.

This will take you to the correct application for your OS.

One needs to keep paper copies of the master record in a safe place.
You will need this to add additional computers.
